descriptions: A multi-vendor e-commerce platform specializing in the sale of medicines and healthcare products should provide a smooth user experience. This platform should facilitate easy purchasing of medications, allow users to submit queries, and offer access to expert advice.
features: Users can easily pay via Stripe, download PDF invoices, and access their payment history.
Sellers can request ads, manage product details, and view sales history and statistics.
Admins can manage user roles, payment and ad statuses, download sales reports, and view statistics.

descriptions: ShineFix is a service-sharing app that lets you quickly find and book trusted, vetted home repair professionals. Our skilled providers offer top-quality, reliable home repair solutions. Enjoy peace of mind with our verified experts, ensuring your home repairs are in capable hands.
features: Service Providers can post about their service.
Providers can update and delete their posts, and set their working status.
Users can book services, view their booking list and status

descriptions: ShineArt is a Art and Cradt store. Where we offer eco-friendly jute and wooden craft. Find unique decor, furniture and accessories made with care by skilled artisans.

Have a Filter system based on customization for Artisans.
